Detailed Description

Main program for a slave mpi process.

Loads all input files, sets up memory and runs calibration or prediction based on scenario file and command line arguments. Accepts coeffecients from the master to produce calibration data. For credits see CREDITS.TXT

Function Documentation

Signal handling function catches signals during program.

Catches pretty much all signals.

int main (  int argc,
char * argv[]
) 
 

Main entry point for the slave mpi process.

Sets up simulation and accepts input from the master to produce calibration data.
